SEARCH
Modul de.hitec.nhplus
Package de.hitec.nhplus.controller

Klasse AllTreatmentController

java.lang.Object
de.hitec.nhplus.controller.AllTreatmentController
public class AllTreatmentController extends Object
The AllTreatmentController class manages the treatment overview view. It handles displaying, filtering, adding, editing, and soft-deleting treatments, as well as initializing UI elements like the ComboBox and TableView.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • AllTreatmentController

      public AllTreatmentController()

  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after the FXML has been loaded. Sets up column bindings, populates the ComboBox and TableView, and defines handlers for selection and double-click actions.

    • readAllAndShowInTableView

      public void readAllAndShowInTableView()
      Loads all treatments from the database, assigns nurse names to each treatment, and populates the TableView with the result.

    • handleComboBox

      public void handleComboBox()
      Filters the displayed treatments based on the selected patient in the ComboBox. If "all" is selected, all treatments are shown. Otherwise, only treatments for the selected patient are displayed.

    • handleMarkForDelete

      public void handleMarkForDelete()
      Handles the deletion of the selected treatment by marking it as deleted. Shows a confirmation dialog and updates the deletedBy field with the current user.

    • handleNewTreatment

      public void handleNewTreatment()
      Opens the window to create a new treatment. Requires a patient to be selected via the ComboBox; otherwise, an info dialog is shown.

    • handleMouseClick

      public void handleMouseClick()
      Opens the treatment edit window when a treatment row is double-clicked in the table.

    • newTreatmentWindow

      public void newTreatmentWindow(Patient patient)
      Opens the New Treatment window for the specified patient. Loads the FXML view, initializes the controller, and opens the modal window.
      Parameter:
      patient - the patient to assign the new treatment to

    • treatmentWindow

      public void treatmentWindow(Treatment treatment)
      Opens the Treatment Edit window for the given treatment. Loads the FXML view, initializes the controller, and opens the modal window.
      Parameter:
      treatment - the treatment to edit
